info.title: Azure Sphere V2 Management
info.description: Use these APIs to manage Azure Sphere V2 in your Azure subscription.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
List Catalog resources by subscription ID
List Certificate resources by subscription ID
List DeviceRegistration resources by subscription ID
List ProvisioningPackage resources by subscription ID
List Catalog resources by resource group

attestationPublicKey.description: Attestation public key of the device.

DeviceRegistrationUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the DeviceRegistration.

DeviceRegistrationUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the DeviceRegistration.

attestation.description: Policy if device attestation is required before delivering a certificate.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

version.description: Version of the provisioning package format.

catalogName.description: Name of the catalog where the devices will be provisioned and activated.

baseEndpoint.description: Base of the endpoint of the catalog used in the device for the different AS3 services including attestation, device insights and others.

challenge.description: Unique random GUID proof of possession challenge value used during provisioning and activation stages to validate the possession of the private key in the device.

createdDate.description: An UTC creation date of the provisioning package.

expirationDate.description: An UTC expiration date of the provisioning package defined by the Catalog owner during provisioning package creation. New devices cannot be activated in the catalog after the expiration date.

ProvisioningPackageFormatActionResponse.description: Values of the format provisioning package response.

value.description: The ProvisioningPackage items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ProvisioningPackageListResult.description: The response of a ProvisioningPackage list operation.

challenge.description: Proof of possession challenge value for device provisioning.

baseEndpoint.description: Base endpoint for data plane operations including devices to request a certificate with the attestation measurements and others.

expirationDate.description: Expiration date for his bulk device registration.

ProvisioningPackageUpdate.description: The type used for update operations of the ProvisioningPackage.

ProvisioningPackageUpdateProperties.description: The updatable properties of the ProvisioningPackage.

packageLocation.description: URI with the location of the activation package.

Certificate.serialNumber.name: serialNumber
Certificate.serialNumber.description: Serial number of the certificate. Use 'active' to retrieve the latest.
